_id.description: The unique identifier for the document (auto-generated)

id_station.description: Station ID, must be a string and is required

dh_utc.description: Datetime of the reading in UTC, must be a string with a valid datetime format (required)

temperature.description: Temperature in Celsius, must be a number (required)

pression.description: Pressure in hPa, must be a number (required)

humidite.description: Humidity percentage, must be a number (required)

point_de_rosee.description: Dew point in Celsius, must be a number (required)

vent_moyen.description: Average wind speed in m/s, must be a number (required)

vent_rafales.description: Wind gust speed in m/s, can be null if data not available

vent_direction.description: Wind direction in degrees (0 to 360), must be an integer (required)

pluie_3h.description: Rainfall in the last 3 hours, can be null if data not available

pluie_1h.description: Rainfall in the last 1 hour, must be a number (required)

visibilite.description: Visibility in meters, can be null if data not available

neige_au_sol.description: Snow on the ground, can be null if data not available

nebulosite.description: Cloudiness, can be an empty string if no data

temps_omm.description: Miscellaneous weather information, can be null if data not available
